package.description:
A driver for TASER's main battery. Publishes the voltage on the battery_voltage topic at 0.1 Hz and also offers a service named get_voltage.
Employs the NET_DEV-variant of the peak-system pcan-dongle driver and the linux can- socket network stack to talk to the CAN-IO-board, to which the battery-voltmeter is connected.
package.author: Ben Adler, adler@informatik.uni-hamburg.de
